txt.en:
'The Haradrim are powerful with the bow and sword alike. We may be able to turn this conflict in our favour if we are to defeat them.

'Will you aid us in these dark times?'

<rgb=#FF0000>This bounty can only be completed a maximum of three times.</rgb>
Glanion is in the city of Linhir.\n\nYou should speak with Glanion.
Glanion hopes to stem the tide of Haradrim troops by decimating their ranks.
'The Haradrim forces are surely hurt from your deeds. I thank you for that. Still, there is much left to be done.'
Haradrim can be found throughout Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nDefeat Haradrim in Dor-en-Ernil.
